#include <iostream>
#include <string>
#include <map>
using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	int t, n;
	string s, v;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--) {
		cin >> n;
		map<string, string> vote;
		for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			cin >> s >> v;
			vote[s] = v;
		}

		int ans = 0;
		for(map<string, string>::iterator i = vote.begin(); i != vote.end(); i++) {
			if(i->second == "+") ans++;
			else ans--;
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
